00011     cerr << "tcp_client k|u host port" << endl;

00014 void die(int fd) {
00015     minet_close(fd);
00016     minet_deinit();
00017     exit(0);
00018 }

00020 int main(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00021     char buf[512];
00022     sockaddr_in server_sa;
00023     sockaddr_in client_sa;
00024     struct hostent * he = NULL;
00025     int fd = 0;
00026     int rc = 0;
00027 
00028     if (argc != 4) {
00029         usage();
00030         exit(-1);
00031     }
00032 
00033     if (toupper(argv[1][0]) == 'K') {
00034         cerr << "Using kernel stack." << endl;
00035 
00036         if (minet_init(MINET_KERNEL) < 0) {
00037             cerr << "Stack initialization failed." << endl;
00038             die(fd);
00039         } 
00040     } else {
00041         cerr << "Using Minet User Level Stack." << endl;
00042         if (minet_init(MINET_USER) < 0) {
00043             cerr << "Stack initialization failed." << endl;
00044             die(fd);
00045         } 
00046     }
00047 
00048    cerr << "Stack initialized." << endl;
00049 
00050     he = gethostbyname(argv[2]);
00051 
00052     if (he == 0) {
00053         cerr << "Unknown host." << endl;
00054         die(fd);
00055     }
00056 
00057     bzero(&server_sa, sizeof(server_sa));
00058     server_sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00059     memcpy((void *)(&(server_sa.sin_addr)), he->h_addr, he->h_length);
00060     server_sa.sin_port = htons(atoi(argv[3]));
00061 
00062     fd = minet_socket(SOCK_STREAM);
00063 
00064     if (fd < 0) {
00065         cerr << "Can't create socket." << endl;
00066         minet_perror("reason:");
00067         die(fd);
00068     } 
00069         
00070     cerr << "Socket created." << endl;
00071 
00072     bzero(&client_sa, sizeof(client_sa));
00073     client_sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00074     client_sa.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
00075     client_sa.sin_port = htons(0);
00076 
00077     if (minet_bind(fd, &client_sa) < 0) {
00078         cerr << "Can't bind socket." << endl;
00079         minet_perror("reason:");
00080         die(fd);
00081     }
00082 
00083     cerr << "Socket bound." << endl;
00084 
00085     if (minet_connect(fd, &server_sa) < 0) {
00086         cerr << "Can't connect socket." << endl;
00087         minet_perror("reason:");
00088         die(fd);
00089     }
00090 
00091     cerr << "Socket connected." << endl;
00092     cout << "Enter text to send." << endl;
00093 
00094     while (1) {
00095 
00096         if ((rc = read(fileno(stdin), buf, 512)) < 0) {
00097             cerr << "Read failed." << endl;
00098             minet_perror("reason:");
00099             break;
00100         }
00101 
00102         if (rc == 0) {
00103             cerr << "Done." << endl;
00104             break;
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (minet_write(fd, buf, rc) < 0) {
00108             cerr << "Write failed." << endl;
00109             minet_perror("reason:");
00110             break;
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     die(fd);
00115 
00116     return 0;
00117 }
